name: Senior Unity Games Developer (with strong English skills)
description:
We have been working since 2018. Over the years we have grown from a passionate group of friends to a dedicated team of experienced developers. Now we are one of the strongest agencies in the development of software, mobile games and applications. Datasakura now has over 35 employees and we continue to expand. We invite Unity Games Developer to join our team.

We are looking for:

  • At least 4 years of experience in unity development;
  • At least one live app in the store (iOS or Android);
  • Strict understanding of SOLID principles, clean code;
  • Experience in building and supporting architecture from scratch;
  • English Upper-intermediate;
  • Technical education;
  • Excellent communication skills, proactive approach, responsibility.

Will be a plus:

  • Experience in building a client-server architecture;
  • Knowledge of agile development methodologies (scrum).

We offer:

  • Full-time, remote work without business trips to the office, you can work from any location in Europe and Asia.

  • Stable salary in dollars or USDT with annual review

  • No bureaucracy, micromanagement and lengthy approvals

  • Fixed hours without the use of time trackers, depending on the time zone and your wishes (we believe in work\life balance)

  • Permanent contract with a Cyprus company, paid vacation 34 working days

  • Small, friendly agile teams

  • Online English classes with a native speaker in a small group

  • Payment for coworking space and compensation for equipment costs

  • The possibility of relocation to Serbia after a trial period


    P.S. Please send a CV with a link to a github or other resources where we can see your unity and C# code.
